product_name: Woolrich Kristie Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Kristie rain jacket from Woolrich looks great in its beautiful plaid fabric. It offers lightweight waterproof, breathable and windproof protection so you can get on with your day. Breathable 2.5-layer nylon offers complete protection from the rain and wind, and is durable, yet soft and packable; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Hood with drawcord, internal windflap behind front zipper, drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs all enhance comfort. Woolrich Kristie jacket has zip hand pockets and a flap-close chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Kristie rain jacket from Woolrich looks great in its beautiful plaid fabric. It offers lightweight waterproof, breathable and windproof protection so you can get on with your day.
